mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_shipping ( email, recipient, destination, contact_number, is_default_shipping, roadAddrPart1, roadAddrPart2, zipNo, addrDetail ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{recipient}, #{destination}, #{contact_number}, #{is_default_shipping}, #{roadAddrPart1}, #{roadAddrPart2}, #{zipNo}, #{addrDetail} )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(shipping_no) AS max_shipping_no FROM tbl_shipping;
